title: Do you earn less LP for duo games?
body:
I was under the impression that the higher your mmr, the more LP you earn and the less you lose. 

Ive been slowly rising for a while, I've won the last 6 games in a row, got up division into silver during those wins, haven't lost a game in silver yet. so my MMR cant be all that bad?

yet I'm still earning only 18 LP per win (19 on the very odd occasion) which is (as far as i have seen) the minimum. I haven't lost yet (probably just jinxed it) but when i do i bet i lose 21. (which is the usual number i lose per loss) 

The only explanation is that its earning less cos I'm a duo, but that cant be right because basically everything riot does is to make you go duo.

so what is the answer?

[EDIT]: Yup lost and lost 20 LP, i even checked op.gg and it says "your MMR is quite a bit higher than average." so sense...

replies.body: Bronze 3 i think, maybe higher, he is better than me, but has had even worse luck than me this season.
Nope i just played one by myself, lost and still lost more LP than i earn
so riot puts all these things like dynamic q and hextech crafting and everything else, then when you do duo, theyre like "yeahhh nah sorry mate fuck you."
